entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Thunderstorms and localised downpours possible during Friday morning. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain with localised downpours and thunderstorms possible. Amounts may approach warning criteria, mainly about northern and western areas of the region. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: The entire Taranaki region is now under a rain Watch, and only for period during Friday morning.
